start.text: You wake up in the morning in your...

choices.text: Have a granola bar or cereal
Grab a bite from your local bakery
Get some quick breakfast at a nearby coffee shop

morning.tip: Driving to a local bakery or coffee shop is drastically less sustainable than making your own food, or having pre-made goods.

morning.text: You mow your lawn this morning with a...

choices.text: Oh wait, you don’t have a lawn

morning.tip: Around 78% of greenhouse gases come from the production and consumption of energy, so try to limit your usage of fuel and power such as gas and electricity

morning.text: After your regular morning routine, you remember that it's time to tend to your small garden. You do this every...
morning.tip: If you water your grass and trees more heavily, but less often, this saves water and builds stronger roots.

afternoon.text: It’s grocery day and you want to go shopping for some meat, vegetables, water, and snacks...

choices.text: I guess I’ll call a shared Uber

afternoon.tip: Generally, utilizing shared/public transportation reduces a cities’ carbon footprint as opposed to driving for yourself

afternoon.text: You arrive at the store and get your weekly groceries. As you line up for checkout, you check out today’s haul of...
afternoon.tip: Food production accounts for over a quarter of the world’s greenhouse gas emissions. Try to encourage the purchase of organic goods.

afternoon.text: You decided you want to go camping for fun. For food, do you either...
afternoon.tip: The fast food industry is one of the largest contributors to global climate change

evening.text: When you get back home from the movies, you realize that you have a giant food stain on your brand new Unisex Hanes Relaxed Fit Authentic Crewneck T-Shirt. You need to remove this stain ASAP...

choices.text: Wash the stain using the washing machine

evening.text: It’s the end of the day and you want to bathe. You...

choices.text: Decide to skip hygiene for the day
Scrub your body with a wet cloth

evening.tip: Showering and bathing are the largest indoor uses (27%) of water domestically. Taking a shower usually saves more water than using a bathtub, and cutting shower times by a few minutes will save gallons of water.

evening.text: You and your closest friend receive invites from Zach Synder himself to watch his exclusive cut of The Justice League. On the day of, both of you...

choices.text: Wait for Zach to pick you up

evening.tip: Carpooling and taking advantage of public transit has a multitude of benefits, one of which includes the reduction of carbon emissions within the atmosphere.

evening.text: You've reached the theater with your friend and you hear your friend's stomach rubble, which causes your stomach to rubble. You need food. What would be your go-to meal at the movies?

choices.text: Gourmet Nathan's Hot Dog with Premium Bun
A Fresh Cut Vegan Gourmet Salad
Gourmet Popcorn with Melted Gourmet Butter
Nostalgic 2 for 1 Lunchables (the ones you had as a kid)
Gourmet Pre-Packaged Pepperoni Pizza Warmed at 425 degrees

evening.tip: Diets that include meat have a 41.5% larger environmental footprint as compared to vegetarian and/or vegan diets, as published in a study by ADEME.

evening.text: You are having dinner with friends tonight and look forward to having a good time. You all agreed on...

choices.text: Your group’s favorite fast food joint
A meal from one of your friends at their place

evening.tip: A typical restaurant meal's CO2e emissions is over 3 times the CO2e emissions of a meal made at home. Also, preparing or sharing food at home is usually cheaper.

end.text: The sun has set. You decide to sleep at...
end.tip: Staying up late with lights on adds to CO2 emissions. Going to bed earlier will help reduce emissions and earn savings on your electricity bill - on average, lighting accounts for 25-30% of a monthly electricity bill.

story.text: You wake up in the morning in your...
